sentence.Network_en: Within an hour he was half seas over and incapable of getting home by himself.
sentence.Network_cn: 不到一个小时他就醉了,没法独自回家.

sentence.Network_en: You came home at dawn, looking half seas over.
sentence.Network_cn: 你天亮的时候才回家, 看样子喝得醉醺醺的.

sentence.Network_en: They came home at dawn, looking half seas over.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们黎明才回到家, 个个面带醉容.
